Posts.Content: Nov 22, 2007 12:50AM nikki2138401 wrote: I am 25 years old and I was just diagnosed with stage 2 breast cancer I am so scared.I don't know what to do I am young and was always the one that said this could never happen to me.I have four kids and don't know how to tell them or how this is going to affect them
